director.name: Houssam El-Din Mustafa Houssam El-Din Mustafa

introduction: An Egyptian thriller about a prisoner who gives his word of honor to come back to prison if he is let free for one day. Often listed among the masterpieces of Arabic cinema, especially for its cinematography and acting. Directed by Houssam El-Din Mustafa ("Sonya and the Madman") and starring Ahmad Mazhar ("Empire M"), Farid Shawki and Hend Rostom.
